abstract.t: A Presence service can have constraints for delivering presenceinformation to devices with low data processing capabilities, smalldisplay, and limited battery power. Other limitations can be causedby the interface between the terminal and the network, i.e. overradio links with high latency and low bandwidth. This memo presents asolution that aids in reducing the impact of those constrains and toincrease efficiency, by introducing a mechanism called partialnotification.
